body_html: Increasing the ulimit solved the issue. Details (fastai/fastai#23). When using Docker, the ulimit is set very high so you may never see the issue, but Ubuntu instance by default had 1024 (file descriptor limit). Increasing it to 2048 or 4096 or higher solves the issue. I don't know why that many file descriptors are required, but glad that it had a simple fix.

body: Increasing the `ulimit` solved the issue.  Details (https://github.com/fastai/fastai/issues/23).  When using Docker, the `ulimit` is set very high so you may never see the issue, but Ubuntu instance by default had 1024 (file descriptor limit).  Increasing it to 2048 or 4096 or higher solves the issue.  I don't know why that many file descriptors are required, but glad that it had a simple fix.
